nodes.text: Point 5 was a gambling game invented on the planet Atzerri. Cix Trouvee gambled on games of Point 5 among many other games of chance, and it was one of the many games available to passengers aboard the passenger liner Lady of Mindor in 2 ABY, and at the Illuminated Aquean on Vaynai. Around 16 ABY, the entertainment district known as the Revels on Atzerri offered ninety percent payoffs at the original establishment that invented the game.
